case.state: Watch out, ladies. I'm here to get me a man from somewhere in this secret club. If you get in my way, things are gonna get ugly.
Watch out, ladies. I'm here to get me a man from somewhere in this secret club. If you get in my way, things are gonna get ugly.
Yeah, I'll stick with all but ~cards~, thank you.
I'll exchange ~cards~ cards.
~cards~ should do it for this hand.
Can I request ~cards~ specific cards?
This thing tells me to take ~cards~ this hand.
Let's change out ~cards~ this hand.
Give me ~cards~. And make them good this time.
I'm desperate. I need ~cards~ good cards. And none of those crap cards like last time!
I need ~cards~. Plus a few more to cover my chest.
Yes! The system works!
You can all just save some time and start getting naked now.
Have you all had enough yet?
If you'd rather play for money, I'd that that from you too.
Yes!
Let's do this!
Setting Backman Turners to overdrive!
I only gamble with chumps!
It's not the quality of the cards, it's the quality of the player.
These are plenty good enough!
This will be just like stomping a puppy.
Hey, Dealer. Thanks for the cards. By the way, are you single?
Oooh! I like these!
This hand should keep some clothing on for a change!
It's a little late in the game for me to start getting cards like this!
Okay. First one to make a "One Eyed Jack" crack gets a phaser across the face.
So far this thing hasn't given me bad advice.
Hmm. Should I let the boys win some hands? To keep their confidence up?
Okay. First one to make a "One Eyed Jack" crack gets a karate chop to the face.
So far this thing hasn't given me that bad of advice.
Okay. First one to make a "One Eyed Jack" crack gets a boot to the face.
Well, that isn't too bad.
These cards aren't so bad.
Yeah. I'll stick with this hand, thank you.
Not the worst hand I've ever seen.
Yeah. I'll stick with this one, thank you.
These cards are just okay. So I have to resort to distraction.
This is the best I can do.
I think these are good enough. Though I thought the last hands were good enough too.
The whole playing for clothes isn't going so great; Anybody up for playing for money on this hand?
Now to hope that my pair is good enough to win here.
We're nearing the end, but I should be okay here.
This depeches mode.
This blinds melon.
This pinks Floyd.
This smashes pumpkins.
This fleetwoods Mac.
This dafts punk.
This toads the wet sprocket.
This savages garden.
This gnarls Barkley.
This wangs chung.
This vans halen.
This jethros tull.
This eats world.
This verucas salt.
This blacks sabbath.
This limps biscuit.
This smashes mouth.
This kings crimson.
This verves pipe.
This bel bivs devoe.
This walks the moon.
This woos tang.
This defs leppard.
Oh, Lord.
Fine. The rest of you are doing it, so I may as well too.
You're just jealous.
Oh, you're all so cute!
I'm ahead by enough. I don't need this thing giving me poker tips any more.
All right, cool your jets, hot shot.
I don't know! It's not an easy decision. If only I had two or three minutes to think about it.
Listen buddy, by the end of the day, one of us is gonna to have one eye!
Just because I'm winning, doesn't mean I think less of the men here.
If you want to keep having more eyes than me, you'd better get them back in your head.
It really seems like I should have won by now.
Again? Aren't you all out of the game yet?
I mean, the rest of you are more or less naked. It's what the people want!
So, anything we've brought with us counts as clothes, right?
Me? Really?
You have GOT to be kidding me.
Oh Lord.
This thing on my wrist says that I should take off this thing on my wrist next.
Why? And also how, and what?
Now, unfortunately, the media is going to put a negative spin on this. Like when we killed that guy.
Big deal. I'm on Comedy Central. Not like they are going to let me show anything good.
Oh, for the love of Benji.
Well, here goes.
Well, I don't have a "porn star" career chip installed, but what the hey.
Forget it! I promised myself I wouldn't pose naked until I was married. ...Unless you want to get married!
My whole life has just been a show for some perverted mutant!
I'll be standing here quietly if anybody needs me.
I've been a fool. A fully justified, prudent fool.
Okay, men. Here we go. It's show time.
Yeah, well it's early. You still have plenty of time to ditch me like all the other guys.
I don't deserve this at all! I'm supposed to watching the guys get naked.
It's fine. It's not like this thing has been giving me any good tips on poker.
I don't need help. For your information, I did this all by myself.
Well, this is what I came here for. To see and to be seen.
Ok. Maybe I am freaking out a little.
Hey! You can't feel sorry for me! I'm a space captain and you're all a bunch of losers!
Wait, this could be a good thing! Gather around close, boys!
If I die from shame, make sure my body freezes in a dignified position! None of that "huddled over for warmth" crap!
I only signed up for this game to check out naked men. This wasn't part of my plan!
So, lets say I do lose this dating game. Are the parting gifts any good?
Forget it! I promised myself I wouldn't pose naked until I was married. ...Unless you want to get married!
We were all just messing around and joking about that "forfeit" thing, right?
Well, I've lost to all my opponents. Even that woman who turned out to be me in the mirror.
Don't you think I feel bad enough already?
Oh God! What have I done?
Well, it appears I'm boned. And maybe later, I can be boned again.
Time for me to set my phaser to "Over there."
This stupid thing has been holding me back anyways.
I'd better get these boots back afterward. Not even Amy could tell that they were cheap knockoffs
Hey! My eye is up here!
Thank God most of our fans are huge perverts.
You're about to see parts of me no one has seen before. Except for Fry. *Sigh* And Zapp Brannigan.
Yes, I'm scared right now, but I'm more scared of disappointing myself.
Even without my phaser, I can still kick the asses of most of the chicks here.
I never bothered to return that thing to the cryogenics lab, but it's not my problem anymore.
Hey dealer. My socks got stuck in my boots. Can I put those back on? No?
On second thought, I'd rather you stare at my chest than at my eye. Hey! My boobs are down here!
See anything you like, guys? If so, I left my phone number in my pants pocket.
...and Sean. And Chaz, Adlai, Shatner, Dean Vernon and that shapeshifting Alcazar. And Amy Wong. But that's it.
I guess you never outgrow being an eyeball. ...Oddball.
I'm missing a delivery run for this. I hope you're going to take off something good.
Wow, this is fantastic.
That's so sweet of you, ~name~. But I didn't really get you anything. ...Yet.
And ~name~ finds himself one step closer to showing off his rocket!
Step aside, girls. Let a woman take a gander.
I've been waiting for this moment all game.
Oh. So you only care about my looks?
Ah, here we are. The worst player in history. If I can be just a little better than ~name~, I can slink away with my head held high.
Okay, ~name~. It's fine to be proud but don't be a show off!
Okay, ~name~. It's fine to be proud but don't be a show off.
Just let me know if I can help you take something off, ~name~.
If you don't want to do this in front of these jerkwads, we could always just go back to my place. I promise I'll let you win there too.
Don't think of this as you losing, ~name~. Consider it you and I both winning.
If you don't want to do this in front of the others, we could always just go back to my place. I promise I'll let you win there too.

state.text: I'm missing a delivery run for this. I hope you're going to take off something good.

That's so sweet of you, ~name~. But I didn't really get you anything. ...Yet.
And ~name~ finds himself one step closer to showing off his rocket!
Step aside, girls. Let a woman take a gander.
Oh. So you only care about my looks?
I've been waiting for this moment all game.
Ah, here we are. The worst player in history. If I can be just a little better than ~name~, I can slink away with my head held high.
Okay, ~name~. It's fine to be proud but don't be a show off
Okay, ~name~. It's fine to be proud but don't be a show off.
Just let me know if I can help you take something off, ~name~.
If you don't want to do this in front of the others, we could always just go back to my place. I promise I'll let you win there too.
Don't think of this as you losing, ~name~. Consider it you and I both winning.
So, ~name~, how can I phrase this delicately? You suck at poker.
The game's poker, ~name~. Not Space Rummy.
And I haven't even needed Bender to rig the game in my favor yet.
This thing says that as your embarrassment level rises, your respectability levels are plummeting.
See? Girls can play poker. Just not you, ~name~. Now strip, dummy.
What an absolute skank and all around horrible poker player ~name~ has turned out to be.
Don't take this the wrong way, ~name~, but that was a really stupid play.
I know it's not what you want to hear, ~name~, but I think that you coming here was a big mistake.
While I am looking forward to you embarrassing yourself, keep your hands off my men!
Look boys. ~name~ is no good at party games. Totally undateable.
If you're finished being stupid, go ahead and take something off.
You're doing the right thing.
If you're finished being stupid, go ahead and take something off
What are you, ~name~, a whining machine?
Too late, ~name~. I've already got the guys all looking at me.
This is the first actual work you've ever had to do around here, ~name~.
You may as well just put all your clothes on the floor and go. The men leave with me.
You're finally catching up with me. Except I'm doing my losing on purpose to attract men.
Don't worry about ~name~, Leela. Gotta keep the male gaze on you.
None of the guys are going to even notice you, ~name~. I'm the star right now!
Don't pay any attention to ~name~. The real show is over here!
In your face, non-playable character!
So, ~name~, how can I phrase this delicately? You suck at poker.
The game's poker, ~name~. Not Space Rummy.
And I haven't even needed Bender to rig the game in my favor yet.

See? Girls can play poker. Just not you, ~name~. Now strip, dummy.

Don't take this the wrong way, ~name~, but that was a really stupid play.
I know it's not what you want to hear, ~name~, but I think that you coming here was a big mistake.
While I am looking forward to you embarrassing yourself, keep your hands off my men!
Look boys. ~name~ is no good at party games. Totally undateable.
If you're finished being stupid, go ahead and take something off.
If you're finished being stupid, go ahead and take something off.

You're doing the right thing.
Too late, ~name~. I've already got the guys all looking at me.
This is the first actual work you've ever had to do around here, ~name~.
You may as well just put all your clothes on the floor and go. The men leave with me.
You're finally catching up with me. Except I'm doing my losing on purpose to attract men.
Don't worry about ~name~, Leela. Gotta keep the male gaze on you.
None of the guys are going to even notice you, ~name~. I'm the star right now!
Don't pay any attention to ~name~. The real show is over here!
Okay! It's time to get this strip-show on the road.
Bachelor Number One, if you had to remove a small piece of clothing, what would you take off?
Sit down, ~name~. Take off something small and make yourself more comfortable.
I suppose I should know your name if I'm gonna be drinking ten gallons of alcohol with you. ~name~ is it?
Unless you're about to take off four or five layers, you're still going to be overdressed.
How very nice of you to finally join us, ~name~.
Should I wait for you, or should I keep going?
Look straight at me as you take it off!
Oh you have got to be kidding!
Sorry, ~name~. I was lost in your dreamy eyes. Did you take something off?
All I'm looking for is a guy who's adventurous, self-confident. Doesn't wear too many accessories...
I think the rules say that you have to keep stripping until I've had enough.
We're getting nowhere slowly.
OK, if everyone's finished being stupid.
That's enough insubordination, Mr. ~name~!
I'm almost done here and you're only taking off your ~clothing~?
It's cold as hell out here. Let's speed this game up!
It's going to take you forever to catch up. How many layers do you have?
That's not remotely what I had in mind, ~name~.
Look, you scaly crybaby, you'll do what I say and take off your ~clothing~ now!
Try to stay with the crowd so no one notices how crummy you look.
I'm sure this must be very upsetting for you.
How long is this going to take?
Look, ~name~, I know it's not much consolation, but I understand how you feel.
That is so unbelievably manipulative.
If you had any self-confidence, you'd be taking off real clothing.
That's right. Keep taking it slow. Nobody's watching you right now anyhow.
If I didn't have my hands full right now, I'd shove that ~clothing~ up your keister.
Well if we get bored waiting for ~name~ to take off real clothing, I've got Tetris on this thing.
We're getting nowhere slowly.
That's stupid.
Are you kidding me? Just your ~clothing~?
OK, if everyone's finished being stupid.
Stop it!
Just your ~clothing~? That's not remotely what I had in mind.
Oh, you have got to be kidding me!
The women in this society are a bunch of idiots. You are supposed to be removing clothing, not taking off your ~clothing~.
Who buys this trash? Nice ~clothing~.
The evening's still young. So, ~name~, what do you do for a living?
I hope you're going for something significant and revealing.
There's no hurry. I could stare at you all night.
This is it, the moment we should've trained for.
I should have asked sooner, but do you live alone or should we go to my apartment tonight?
It turns out I'm really good at taking clothes off. Let me know if I can be of any help.
Do me a favor. Whatever you're about to take off, take it off slowly.
Turn around when you take this one off. Mix it up for me!
You're doing great!
A sensible choice for this stage in the game. I like sensible.
I'll be taking your ~clothing~ back to my apartment. If you want to come get it back.
It's a start, ~name~. But you've got some catching up to do.
It was ~name~'s decision to chose what to strip this round. And he made it wrong, so it's time for us to interfere.
It was ~name~'s decision to chose what to strip this round. And he made it wrong, so it's time for us to interfere
Come on, ~name~. I'm putting on a show for you, and that's all you're taking off?
Don't let them mock you for only taking off your ~clothing~. Look at how happy you're making me right now!
If you wanted to be a gentleman and offer me your ~clothing~ to stay warm, I'd probably accept.
What lousy trinket or scrap of nothing are you taking off now, ~name~?
That look of panic on your face isn't very becoming, ~name~.
Running out of small items, ~name~. You got what it takes to keep going?
You aren't pulling that childish trick where you have six jackets on, are you?
The bright lights. The entire club looking at you. You aren't chickening out, are you?
I'm assuming you're too scared to take off something significant.
Look at me. All naked and hot. And then there's ~name~ taking off small things.
If I put a dollar at your feet, will you finally take off something that counts?
This feels so good. Too bad you're afraid to actually take anything important off, ~name~.
You're going to have to try harder to get noticed around here, ~name~.
I'm going to take a guy or two out back for a bit. You let us know when you're ready to get serious.
At least you don't smell as bad as your ~clothing~.
They smell like burning Rhesus monkey. Put your ~clothing~ somewhere else.
Very nice. Where'd you steal them?
He's going to chose me over you, ~name~. I'm the one who's going to win!
That's right, you shouldn't have. I still don't get what the big attraction is.
This is ~name~'s decision. And she made it wrong, so it's time for us to interfere in her life.
What the hell are you supposed to be?
That's ridiculous.
Yeah, sorry. Nobody was paying attention to you removing your ~clothing~.
This is completely reckless! Don't you ever think ahead?
Well, at least here you'll be treated with dignity. Now strip naked and get on the Probulator.
You're not doing very well at the stripping part of the game. But I'd still take you home tonight.
Take it off or I'll break it off.
Personally, I don't care how many eyes a guy has. As long as it's less than five.
I do so love a man in uniform. And a man out of uniform.
Relax. Everything will be fine.
Don't be embarrassed. It's totally natural.
Trust me. It's far, far to late for either of us to start being shy.
I see that I've gotten your attention. Well you've got mine too!
Aw, you didn't have to do that.
You look good like that.
If anything, I'm more impressed.
I do like seeing your ~clothing~ on the floor.
Oh. Well that's very handsome of you.
You're almost naked. I'm almost naked. It's like it's our destiny to be together
Come give Mama a hug!
I appreciate the gallantry, but isn't this a bit much?
You're almost naked. I'm almost naked. It's like it's our destiny to be together.
Good to see you, ~name~.
That's more like it.
You've got to take it off! I don't care how suicidal it is.
Remember, Leela. Don't show any positive reaction to her appearance.
You looked stupid in your ~clothing~ anyhow. That was outdated even in the 20th Century!
Oh, wow. Awful ~clothing~. That was outdated even in the 20th Century!
Aw! Also, oh, Lord.
Good luck competing with this body, ~name~!
Is my eye playing tricks on me? Is ~name~ about to take of an important piece of clothing?
Shut up, Leela. Don't let her know that you wish you had that ~clothing~.
Hoping to impress people by taking off your ~clothing~ was so five hands ago.
Keep up, ~name~. Some of us are doing way better at this game than you are.
Now if any men in attendance could take note of what a loser ~name~ is. I, on the other hand, am not a loser.
You're about halfway naked, ~name~. You should be getting a little less rational now.
If you wouldn't take my help when you didn't need it, why should I give it to you now, when you do need it?
You make this look so easy. Like you've done it before. Probably frequently and professionally.
Nice ass, ass.
You're a little too late to start flaunting your body now, ~name~.
Oh no. If there's one kind of competition I can't stand, it's any competition.
Well look at Little Miss ~name~-come-lately. Well, you're too late. I'm Leela-cumming-shortly.
Hey ~name~, if you aren't prepared to go all the way, get out of mine.
I'll take ~name~'s top for the block.
I'll be back to see you topless in two and two.
Bachelor Number Two; I want to see your chest.
Yay! The Elimination Round. Time to eliminate everything over your belt!
I'll take "~name~'s Top" for $400. No really. Give me your shirt.
We have asked ~name~'s top to go off stage while his chest remains here to answer some questions.
I don't care if ~name~ is a millionaire or not. I just want to see him topless!
"No Deal," Howie. But I will take ~name~'s top.
Don't stop playing with it, ~name~. I want to see how this ends.
Wow! If I knew I was going to meet you, I would have done something with my hair!
If anything, I'm more impressed!
It's like staring into the face of God!
That's great, really. But you may not be quite what I'm looking for, ~name~. Oh wait. Come back. I'm desperate!
Hey ~name~, I know something you could lay bare.
Settle in, girls. It's wiener time.
Come on, ~name~. Can't you let the little guy out?
Not to seem desperate or anything, but take 'em off already!
Let me see it, and then I'll decide if I'm interested in you. Who am I kidding, ~name~? I'm interested in you.
It's okay, ~name~. You're lonely and I'm lonely. But together we're lonely together
Hey, something's coming straight towards us!
It's okay, ~name~. You're lonely and I'm lonely. But together we're lonely together.
That's kinda pathetic.
Look what life was like before genetic engineering. Those poor 20th century women.
Those poor 20th century women.
Don't worry, ~name~. We'll get it there.
For a split second, my common sense was overwhelmed by pity.
Is there a Mrs. ~name~?
Sit down, ladies. I saw it first, it's mine!
Look. It really is beautiful. I don't know why I never noticed it before.
I'd better light some candles.
Well, at least we're losers together, ~name~.
If you're feeling shy, I can think of a few places you could hide that.
It's a hundred times more incredible than anything I could imagine.
Leave him alone. It's not his fault that he's an unstoppable killing machine.
I'm just so scared. Kiss me.
Feel free to point that thing at me anytime!
You seem to be in a bit over your head, ~name~, but I don't think anybody else has noticed.
Let me give you a little tip before it's too late. Try to get cards that have the same number on them.
I'm not laughing with you. I'm totally laughing at you.
Don't you think you're taking 'Easy-to-get' a little too far, ~name~?
I don't envy you. Every guy in the room is looking at you right now. Wait. I do envy you!
Nobody would think less of you if you just quit now, ~name~. At least not to your face.
Hey, pipe down, ~name~. Nobody cares.
Don't be nervous, ~name~. Even though there's a lot of people getting ready to judge you.
Lucky timing for you, ~name~. What, with all the guys watching me and not you.
No! Don't pay attention to ~name~! Look at how sexy I'm being!
Dr. Zoidberg did your implant surgery, didn't he?
I'm sure there's some substance somewhere in the galaxy that can help with those.
They're so cute. They're like if puppies and kittens could have babies.
Don't worry. Genetic engineering comes a long way in the future.
If you can change your shape, why didn't you change it in the one place that mattered?
Those are fine, I guess.
"Boobs. Boobs make people dumb!" I'm just kidding. I can't believe I used to spout that crap for 17 turns in a row.
Big deal. Every girl humanoid has boobs.
I wouldn't think less of you if you quit now. I already think so little of you.
What sorority do you belong to?
I guess we all saw what we wanted to see.
Those must be some of those Led Zeppelins I've heard so much about!
You could orbit a small moon around those!
You must have spent some time swimming in the toxic lake beneath New New York.
You need to be more careful around power generators. You've apparently been hit with a huge dose of radiation!
You make me feel so not weird.
Those are going to hurt when you get to this stage, ~name~.
Would you like us to put you out of your misery?
Not real bright, ~name~.
This wasn't one of your brighter ideas, ~name~.
Prepare for pants-down!
It's almost time to do a fluid level check, isn't it, ~name~?
Are we even allowed in ~name~'s Forbidden Zone?
It's almost time for you to do a fluid level check, isn't it, ~name~?
~Name~ is just the appetizer, boys. I'll be the main course tonight.
No. Don't look at ~name~. Pay attention to me! I'm almost naked too!
No pressure, ~name~!. I've already set the crotch bar pretty high.
Stop looking at ~name~!. I'm already naked over here.
The good news for you is that nobody is even looking at you right now, ~name~.
Stop looking at ~name~!. I'm the one already playing with myself!
This game is easy. Apparently like you, ~name~.
Aw, it's cute. Wait, no it's not!
I have to go. This is just too freaky!
Oh, my God! It's a black hole!
Let's see what you got. Touch your toes.
What is that box, you old witch?
That's the worst thing I've ever seen.
Wait a minute. This is something the boys might want to see. Put on some clothes, ~name~!
Back off, ~name~. I've got first dibs on any male in this sector.
Well, ~name~, it looks like you get to hold on to your lower horn.
This coming together of superstars really means a lot to you, doesn't it
You're glowing like the Human Torch on prom night.
So, once more we meet again.
Come join me. All the beautiful people are doing it.
Whenever you're ready, ~name~. I'm still all seduced from before.
I can't believe it. I've dreamed of this moment all my life.
This is no time for stage fright. I won you fair and square!
~Name~, that's so sweet. Let me see.
I've been waiting all game for this. But be sure to save some of that for later.
Let me know what I can do to help you out, ~name~.
If you're a good boy, I'll be joining you in just a hand or two.
Well, that is touchingly pathetic. I guess I can't let you go alone.
I can free up my other hand if you need help, ~name~.
I don't have much else going on right now. Need any help?
Now it's my turn to watch you, ~name~. It's like destiny has brought us together.
I saw the way you were looking at me. It looked kinda like how I'm about to be looking at you!
It'll get there.
I may choose ~name~. I love his boyish charm, but I hate his childishness. I could watch this all day though.
I deserve this. And more. Keep it coming!
I can't believe it. I've dreamed of this moment all my life.
Chuck, I have made my decision. I'll trade all the clothes I've won for ~name~. He's mine now.
I may choose~ name~. I love his boyish charm, but I hate his childishness. I could watch this all day though.
How long have you been at it? Can you go all night?
Now they may ask for a DNA sample. Oh, good. You're already working on it.
I don't care if you're not the most important person in the universe. It really makes me happy to see you right now.
I thought 21st Century men weren't supposed to be as open about this as you are.
Don't stop playing with it, ~name~. I want to see how this ends.
Come on, before it's too late!
Your cock can apparently take a lot of punishment. That's good to know.
You're one devious bastard. You've done this before.
Come on, ~name~. We have work to do.
In my century it's "Gentlemen first." As long as you hurry.
We'll make it through this together, ~name~. Or die trying.
Hey! Save some for later. Captain's orders!
That was the hottest delivery that I've ever seen!
I kind of hope this whole experience will leave you a little more open to your sensitive side.
Firing pocket rocket!
Wow. That was a lot! Did you save any for later?
Maybe next time, I can help you with that.
Maybe next time, I can help you with that!
It's amazing that two people can fall in love so fast.
I'd like to say that I helped that happen in some little way.
So long, ~name~. What I'll remember is our time together.
"Let's play Strip Poker! It'll be great!" That's me making fun of you, ~name~.
I think everyone will agree. ~name~ is just too easy.
Look ~name~. if there's one thing I learned from my totally mutual breakup with Sean its that happiness can only come from within you.
No more hands for you, ~name~. Other than your own, I guess.
Okay, ~name~. Just try to be nonchalant.
We'll be grading you on speed and technique. Then I'll do better, if it comes to that.
Okay, look. If I help you with this do you promise to get out of the dating game once and for all?
I'd like to help you but I'm kind of busy. Try to be happy for me.
Here's some free advice, ~name~. The guys are hoping it takes you a very long time to get an orgasm. It boosts their confidence.
Huh. We've barely even started, and you're already out.
Smile, you're about to be broadcast all over the galaxy.
Well look at that. We've barely even started, and you're already out.
In space, no one can hear you scream. In this room, we are all going to hear you scream.
Come on, quit stalling ~name~. You knew the rules when you started.
Yes, you really have to do this. Yes, In front of all of us. Haven't you been on a dating show before?
I'm looking forward to seeing how you do this. So I can do it better.
It's not that I hate you, ~name~. It's that I hate you blatantly copying my moves to steal my men.
You're a day late and a dollar short, ~name~. I'm going to finish before you and get first choice of the men.
I'm going to call you 'South Park,' because I'm finished and even though you're on now, nobody's really watching you.
All the men have already seen all they can handle, sister.
Hey, keep it down, ~name~. Some of us non-losers are still playing a game over here.
You guys can't possibly be considering bringing anyone who makes that much noise back to your apartment.
~Name~, you sound like Fry when he was trying to play the Holophoner.
Now they may ask for a DNA sample. Oh, good. You're already working on it.
Hey, keep it down, ~name~. Those of us non-losers are still playing a game over here.
Things should be getting a little less rational now, ~name~.
You must be one of those liberated 21st Century women.
~Name~, can you at least pretend you're being punished? This is supposed to be a forfeit
Just fire the damn thing already.
How long have you been at it?
It's going to be embarrassing for you when they see how quick you go.
~Name~, can you at least pretend you're being punished? This is supposed to be a forfeit.
My God, ~name~, you're a mess!
Well, that was disturbing.
Aw, come here. Let me give you a kiss. Uh, a hug. A handshake. You know what, I'll text ya some other time.
You could really use a shower.
That was the worst delivery ever.
What stinks? Were you masturbating in New Jersey?
She gave up her dignity to save mine.
You could really use a shower. I'll be there myself soon.
So long, ~name~. What I'll remember is our time together.
Where'd ~name~ learn to operate the controls like that?
What do you want from me? Oh yeah... That. Can I get a chair?
I usually try to keep my feelings pent up inside where it can fester quietly as a mental illness.
Everybody pay attention. Let me grab a chair and I'll show you how this is done.
I'd better not catch any men looking at anything else for the next 10 minutes.
Prepare for takeoff! Let me get in the captain's chair.
At least I'm not the only one who's humiliating themselves for fun, love and profit.
Eh. It looks like fun. I'm in! Pull up a chair!
Well, I may have lost the game, but I'm still going to enjoy this.
Watch closely, boys. You don't want to miss this. It's going to be HOT!
Pull up a seat, as I'm about to do.
Okay, boys. All this - and more - can be yours for the price of a nice dinner.
Can't you all go watch Hypnotoad or something?
Hmmm. This isn't as good as actually being boned, but it's something.
I've never intentionally done this with an audience before.
Okay, Leela. You've got them now. Let's seal the deal.
Sorry, ladies. I've got all the boys' attentions now. Thanks for playing.
I've been on enough of these shows that I knew to bring my own chair.
Hey! You're enjoying this.
I don't know. Usually when I do stuff like this the ship moves.
I'd like to help you but I'm kind of busy. Try to be happy for me.
I'm fine thank you. A real pilot can navigate by feel alone.
OK, almost got it. Steady. Steady. Don't panic.
I have a job to do, and I'm going to do it!
I'm filled with a large number of powerful emotions right now.
I'm not under stress, damnit!
It's crunch time, let's do this!
Maybe I need to take more time for me.
My personal controls are easier to navigate than the Planet Express ship.
Wow, this is fantastic!
Prepare for launch...
Detonation in three... Two... One...
Just a few... more... hundred... thousand... miles...
Okay! That's just about it! I need some air.
Okay, almost got it... Steady... Steady... Don't panic...
Maybe I don't need a man after all. Though still let me know if you're interested.
FRYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY!
HIIIIIIIIII-YAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!
And we have Lift-off!
Still, given the chance, I've given to urges far more shocking.
I suppose you're wondering why I'm covered in whale guts.
I was having the most wonderful dream. Except you were there, and you were there, and YOU were there!
It's the ONLY ingredient of Slurm.
You guys all enjoyed that? Right? Please?
Man, I'm sore all over. I feel like I just went ten rounds with mighty Thor.
There's nothing wrong with my nectar. It's all natural.
Move along everybody. Show's over.
Well, there goes my DNA. What a disgusting yet beautiful process.
See anything you like, boys? I could do that all night!
Well, it was a lot of hard work, but it beats posing in skimpy, demeaning outfits.
I've had a wonderful time today. No one's stared at me, or avoided staring at me, or tried to burn me.
After a whole life of searching I may have finally found where I belong.
I haven't felt this happy since Double Soup Tuesday at the Orphanarium.
Captain's diary: I won the game, but failed to find love in this mission. I sure did lose a lot of clothes though.
I mean, I guess I won. At least I think I won.
All this time I thought they were cheering for me, but they were actually cheering at me.
Am I going crazy? Have my years of wild hedonism finally caught up with me?
Congratulations, ~name~. You've accomplished so much more than most of us would bother to.
